price: ߊ߬ߝߐ߫ ߊ߬ ߡߴߊ߬ ( ߟߊ߫ ߞߏ ߟߊߓߊ߲߫ ߢߊ ) ߟߐ߲߫ ߸ ߣߌ߫ ߡߐ߱ ߟߎ߬ ߟߊߥߟߌ߬ ߘߊ߫ ߕߎ߬ߡߊ ߡߍ߲ ߞߊ߬ ߓߐ߫ ߛߊ߬ߙߌ ߟߎ߬ ߘߐ߫؟
arabic: ۞ أَفَلَا يَعۡلَمُ إِذَا بُعۡثِرَ مَا فِي ٱلۡقُبُورِ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: afalā yaʿlamu idhā buʿ'thira mā fī al-qubūri
